content: {A害羞冒烟}Well mah, that snowy cantaloupe was way too big to carry, and I didn't want it to go bad sitting out there. Wastin' food's just wrong...

content: Baa, I see...{短暂停} {A灵光一现}You could hollow out the snowy cantaloupe, let it dry, seal it with wax, then stuff it with soft cotton to turn it into...

content: So I took my shovel and dug a little hole in the snowy cantaloupe. Started eating... thinking... and somehow, I just kept eating until I was inside it.{短暂停} I mean, how else are you supposed to eat a fresh snowy cantaloupe?

content: {玩家转向Actor0}While I was out for a walk, I noticed something... a little strange in your field. I'll tell you bit by bit, so don't panic, baa.
